name: up-labs-manufacturing-platform
description: UP Labs Manufacturing Intelligence Platform - IoT sensor monitoring and predictive maintenance

scripts.build:lambdas: cd lambdas/ingestSensorData && npm install && npm run build && cd ../.. && cd lambdas/getEquipmentMetrics && npm install && npm run build && cd ../.. && cd lambdas/getEquipmentStatus && npm install && npm run build && cd ../.. && cd lambdas/ultraFastAlerts && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build:infra: cd cdk && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.deploy:quick: npm run build && cd cdk && cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && rm -rf cdk/cdk.out/ && rm -rf lambdas/*/dist/ && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf cdk/node_modules/ && rm -rf lambdas/*/node_modules/
scripts.status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name ManufacturingPlatform-development --query 'Stacks[0].{Status:StackStatus,Outputs:Outputs[*].{Key:OutputKey,Value:OutputValue}}' --output table || echo 'Stack not deployed'

author: UP Labs
